pr_title: Split App class following the object store pattern

timeline.message: Move app native calls into OsApp

timeline.bodyText: Rember to delete other constructors if they are not used anymore.
timeline.author: rorbech

timeline.bodyText:
Does this really need to be public? It looks like it is only used by TestApp which already extends App, so it could just access internals directly.
If not, we need to add JavaDoc and warn people about not using this as it is for internal usage.
timeline.author: cmelchior
